title: A Fragile Trust: Plagiarism, Power, and Jayson Blair at the New York Times (2013)

overview: Jayson Blair is the most infamous serial plagiarist of our time. He unleashed the massive scandal that rocked the New York Times and the entire world of journalism.
storyline: Jayson Blair is the most infamous serial plagiarist of our time. He unleashed the massive scandal that rocked the New York Times and the entire world of journalism.
